name: 2018/11/07 Dinner Adlai Adobo
description: This 2018/11/07 Dinner Adlai Adobo recipe is perfect for those who are looking for a healthy yet delicious meal option. With its low-sodium and low-sugar content, it fits wonderfully into a diet focusing on healthy living. Enjoy a dish that doesn't compromise on flavor while adhering to your health goals.

recipeInstructions.text: Prep your ingredients: Blanch the green beans, chop the red onion, dice the bell pepper, and mince the garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Adlai Rice under cold water until the water runs clear.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Adlai Rice according to package instructions until tender, about 20 minutes, then set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium heat and sauté the red onion, bell pepper, and minced garlic until they're softened, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the blanched green beans to the pan and continue to sauté for another 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the coconut amino into the vegetable mixture and let it simmer for about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the cooked Adlai Rice with the vegetable and coconut amino mixture. Mix well and cook together for another 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
